column2: Barbarians from the north are swarming south! Their jealousy of our wealth and majesty shall bring chaos to the land.
Although the northern threat is far from over, they seemed to have settled for the lands they've acquired for now. We may finally be able to rebuild and reform.
Barbarians from the south are expanding north! Their greed, ambition, and violence are a threat to all. They must be stopped!
Although the southern threat has been eliminated, we must remain vigilant, lest other barbarians repeat such insolence.
Barbarians from the east are expanding west! Their ambition and cruelty are a threat to all. We must put them in their place!
Although the eastern threat has been subdued, we must continue to secure our borders against any and all future foes.
